title: Disney Illusion Island Starring Mickey & Friends
description:
Mickey, Minnie, Donald, and Goofy must travel to each of the three biomes of Monoth to recover three stolen Tomes that protect the island. What secrets will they discover along the way? Disney Illusion Island is a hand-drawn 2D adventure, for the whole family. Set across a seamless interconnected world, players will explore all that Monoth has to offer, from the highest mountains to the deepest roots of the lands. Unlocking abilities, solving puzzles and meeting weird and wonderful characters along the way.
Keeper Up – Scramble to grab collectibles through remixed areas of Monoth , making your way to the finish line in the best time possible in a new time trial mode Union of Gnomes
Mystery In Monoth – Curious clues are popping up across Monoth, and Dash Dolphin needs your help to find them. Locate clues, close cases, and solve this brand-new detective mystery .
Cave Adventuring Scavenger Hunt (C.A.S.H.) – Go on the hunt with the help of Scrooge and the brand-new ability – Dig! C.A.S.H. in for permanent upgrades to help you explore in Cave Adventuring Scavenger Hunt.
